actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to improve prevention of aircraft and airport violence.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to direct the Administrator of the Civil Aeronautics Board to prescribe regulations (1) which require the screening of any property being placed in a public storage area of an airport by weapon-detecting and explosive-detecting procedures or devices, and (2) which require that all property placed abroad an aircraft or placed in airport storage areas bear identification marks which positively identify the owner or bearer.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to improve prevention of aircraft and airport violence.
